text: Lasse Andersen (born 24 May 1995) is a Danish footballer who now plays for Skive IK in his home country.Champions League-målscorer skriver under med SIK Skive Folkeblad ==Career== Andersen started his senior career with Viborg FF in the Danish Superliga, where he made one league appearance and scored zero goals. After that, he played for Kjellerup IF, Havnar Bóltfelag, and Skive IK, where he now plays. == References == == External links == * Lasse Andersen Faroe interview (1) * Lasse Andersen Faroe interview (2) * Lasse Andersen Faroe interview (3) * HB Dane cheers for redemption championship * A bold choice has given Lasse several cards on hand * Former Viborg talent heading to the Champions League Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Viborg FF players Category:Kjellerup IF players Category:Skive IK players Category:Havnar Bóltfelag players
title: Lasse Andersen
